scripts.build: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && git rev-parse --short HEAD; REACT_APP_VER=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`_prod dotenv -e .env.production react-app-rewired build
scripts.dev: export SET NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && cross-env REACT_APP_VER="git rev-parse --short HEAD"_dev dotenv -e .env.development react-app-rewired start
scripts.build_dev: REACT_APP_VER=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`_dev dotenv -e .env.development react-app-rewired build
